edu.umass.cs.gnsserver.gnsapp

Class LocationBasedDemandProfile

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.umass.cs.reconfiguration.reconfigurationutils.AbstractDemandProfile
      • edu.umass.cs.gnsserver.gnsapp.LocationBasedDemandProfile

  • public class LocationBasedDemandProfile
extends edu.umass.cs.reconfiguration.reconfigurationutils.AbstractDemandProfile
    This class maintains the demand profile for a single name. It will select active name servers based on location of the demand. It is based on the old LocationBasedReplication class, but doesn't include checks for unreachable active servers or highly loaded servers.
    Author:
    Westy, arun
